---
title: Translate brand named color references from CSS to Typst
format:
  typst:
    keep-typ: true
brand:
  light:
    color:
      palette:
        dark-grey: "#444"
        blue: "#82aeef"
  dark:
    color:
      palette:
        dark-grey: "#222"
        blue: "#415777"
_quarto:
  tests:
    typst:
      ensureTypstFileRegexMatches:
        -
          - '#block\(fill: brand-color\.dark-grey\)\[\s*#set text\(fill: brand-color\.blue\);'
          - 'blue: rgb\("#82aeef"\)'
          - 'dark-grey: rgb\("#444"\)'
        - []
---


```{=typst}
// stopgap to make this look ok
#set block(inset: 6pt)
```
